23 using simulator_index = int;
24 
26 using step_number = long long;
27 
29 struct variable_id
30 {
32  simulator_index simulator;
33 
35  variable_type type;
36 
38  value_reference reference;
39 };
40 
42 inline bool operator==(const variable_id& a, const variable_id& b) noexcept
43 {
44  return a.simulator == b.simulator && a.type == b.type && a.reference == b.reference;
45 }
46 
48 inline bool operator!=(const variable_id& a, const variable_id& b) noexcept
49 {
50  return !operator==(a, b);
51 }
52 
54 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, variable_id v)
55 {
56  return stream << "(simulator " << v.simulator
57  << ", type " << v.type
58  << ", variable " << v.reference << ")";
59 }
60 
61 } // namespace cse
62 
63 // Specialisation of std::hash for variable_id
64 namespace std
65 {
66 template<>
67 class hash<cse::variable_id>
68 {
69 public:
70  std::size_t operator()(const cse::variable_id& v) const noexcept
71  {
72  std::size_t seed = 0;
73  boost::hash_combine(seed, v.simulator);
74  boost::hash_combine(seed, v.type);
75  boost::hash_combine(seed, v.reference);
76  return seed;
77  }
78 };
79 } // namespace std
